caption: After Polidoro Caldara, called Polidoro da Caravaggio (Italian, 1499 - 1543), Story of Niobe (From the Façade of the Palazzo Milesi). Pen and brown ink and brush and brown ink wash, heightened with white gouache on blue laid paper; 20.7 × 33.2 cm. Gift of H. Kelley Rollings, Class of 1948, and Mrs. Rollings (x1985-36)
